divs: sighting detailsit was about 8:00pm i was out side in my front yard feeding my cats when something flash in the sky i look up to the west and saw a brite star low in the sky changing colors from white to yellow to green to red then back to white. i watch it for about 45 min changing colors.it did not move around alot in the sky,it stay in the same spot.i belive i was looking at a hot air ballon putting on a show for tucson,because they are in town doing a light show,burn at the ua on 9\24\10 pm!so i whent inside my house to bed. got up this moring saw reports on the news of ufo in the northwest night sky.so i wanted to make a report.
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
There were 2 other sightings in Tucson on or around September 23rd 2010
Summary: it look to be about 1 mile high northwest tucson round changing colors not moving alot
